name: Dwarf Zebu
description: All zebu types are recognizable by their prominent hump, drooping ears, slender body, and narrow, elongated head.
image_alt: Dwarf Zebu, photo: Prague Zoo Archive
attractions: The Dwarf Zebu, originating in India, is the smallest breed of domestic cattle and one of many zebu breeds. Zebus are among the oldest domesticated animals, bred over 10,000 years ago.
